When it stops, Angela looks like herself again. So do you, of course, but you realize you liked being her. She's a lot sexier than you. "That felt so weird," Angela says. "And intense. I wonder what else you can do?" 'I don't know. I only just got these powers." "Well, why don't we experiment?" Angela says with a coy smile on her face. How do you play with your newfound abilities? Do you...
1422.title: Playing around

info.brief_description: You have the power to merge or absorb someone elses characteristics to add to yourself.
info.description:
This Story is about being able to Merge or Absorb anyone else to amplify yourself or others.

Please keep it to merging and absorbing. I dont care how the person is merged or absorbed as long as it doesnt involve gay sex (Male to Male) im not into that kind of thing but Lesbian is allowed. The character can absorb a person with any part of his body as long as the other person isnt a male. I also dont like the character dying or becoming fat in some odd way (no offense to anyone). The character merging or absorbing an animal is also allowed.

Your character is Mike Age:16
He is a somewhat dull boy but has the power to merge or absorb anyone else around him by contact with their body.
He may also merge/absorb someone fully and take their whole appearance(gender,body,characteristics) or Mike may merge/absorb them fully but only keep the parts of the character he wants such as merging/absorbing with a female and becoming her fully or keeping her breasts,genetalia,face,hair,etc. Mike can also use his power when hes female aswell allowing him to amplify his bodies characteristics such as increasing breast size, beauty, muscle, texture, strength, and so on.

Susan Age:19
Susan is a very attractive young woman who has DD breasts and sports a very incredible physic. She is Mikes older sister and thinks shes superior to him.

Angela Age:17
Angela is Mikes girlfriend and is an annoyance to Mike at times. She does have a great body with C cup breasts and a very toned ass.

Other characters are welcome to be added but dont keep them out of the story for along time after introducing them. A character must be as active as the story.

Good luck and have fun with the story and plz dont be to harsh with ratings this is my first story.
